ja527:0.4: Ummādantī → ummādanti (bj); ummādantīti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); ummadantī (pts-vp-pli1)
ja527:4.3: bhariyābhipārakassa → bhariyā ahipārakassa (bj, pts-vp-pli1); bhariyā abhipārakassa (sya1ed, sya2ed); bhariyā abhipādakassa (mr)
ja527:9.1: Kadāssu → kadāssu maṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja527:13.1: daṭṭhā → diṭṭho (bj); diṭṭhā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja527:14.6: siyaṁ → siyā (sya1ed, sya2ed); siyāti (pts-vp-pli1) | sivi → sibba (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sīvi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja527:18.1: Yo → so (pts-vp-pli1) | jānāti → pajānāti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja527:18.2: māyida → māyidaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); māyidha (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja527:41.3: Tayī hutā rāja → tayi hutā deva (bj); tayī hutā deva (pts-vp-pli1) | mahapphalā hi → mahapphalā hi me (pts-vp-pli1)
